comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: May 27, 1913, Tuesday Page 12, 837 words BOSTON, May 26. -- Capt. S.N. Doust and Horace Rice of the Australian tennis team and S. Morris Williams, one of the American team, all aspirants for Davis international cup honors, had a chance to size up each other's play for the first time at the Longwood Cricket Club to-day. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A03E6DB143FE633A...
